name: the hawthorn hoodie
notes:
description: soft and warm, the hawthorn hoodie will keep you cozy all year long. this hoodie features roomy balloon sleeves, an oversized hood and a kangaroo pocket. it has simple shaping and uses the half double crochet stitch throughout for easy stitching.

this [pattern is free on my blog!][1]

[this pattern is available as a lion brand kit!][2] the kit comes with all the yarn you need to make your hoodie plus a free copy of the pdf digital download. you can even customize your yarn colors!

i have a full video tutorial available for this pattern. [find part 1 here][3] and [part 2 here!][4]


  [1]: https://www.eandpcrochet.com/the-hawthorn-hoodie-crochet-pattern/
  [2]: https://shrsl.com/3t9if
  [3]: https://youtu.be/nlmbujty2q4
  [4]: https://youtu.be/6v_4imkj0vy
